full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI BSKANG BSHAGS MDOR BSDUS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES RANG GI SLOB MA DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG 'OD ZER ZHES PA'I SNGA MA NAS CHOS RGYAL GYI BSKANG BSHAGS MDOR BSDUS ZHIG 'DI LTA BUR DGOS ZHES YANG YANG @009B BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^BTZUN GZUGS RIG PA SMRA BA YID DGA' CHOS GLING GI BLA MA SPRUL SKU DKON MCHOG GIS BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG BRTZON 'GRUS SO, ,)
